description:
Dr Organic Shampoo Organic Lavender is a fragrant formula designed to cleanse and balance your hair. 

Enriched with organic lavender, this luxurious shampoo helps cleanse the scalp and hair, leaving it feeling refreshed and restored. 

Key benefits:

Cruelty-free
Formulated with organically certified and natural extracts
Free from mineral oils, parabens and SLS’s

Drawing on the power of nature and beauty secrets and traditions of the past, Dr Organic uses organic ingredients to create skincare and beauty products that deliver skin that glows and hair that shines. Their products don’t cost the earth and are free from mineral oils, parabens, SLS’s and are cruelty-free.
name: Dr Organic 265ML
